name: Eyeballing
description:
Can you escape the observer?

Try to find a way out and don't get caught.

Controlls:

  • Movement
    • W - Forward
    • A - Left
    • S - Backward
    • D - Right
    • L. Shift - Run
  • View
    • Mouse - Look Around
  • Menu
    • Escape - Reset/Menu
*The game is played  best with headphones.
